content: Please resize the window or enable full-screen mode

comment.text: This translation key is used for a warning message that advises users to resize their window or enable full-screen mode. It appears in a breakpoint warning component on mobile devices where only the small screen size is unavailable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ole hyvä ja muuta ikkunan kokoa tai ota koko näytön tila käyttöön' is a bit too formal for a UI prompt. 'Ole hyvä' (please) isn't necessary and adds unnecessary politeness. It's more appropriate to be direct and concise in a UI context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Muuta ikkunan kokoa tai ota koko näytön tila käyttöön

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word ' չափափոխել' (chapaphoxel) is a double repetition of 'ափոխել' (apoxel) - meaning 'resize'. It is unnecessarily verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Խնդրում ենք փոփոխել պատուհանը կամ միացնել լիաէկրան ռեժիմը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ウィンドウを大きくするか、フルスクリーンモードに切り替えてください' while technically correct, sounds a bit formal and abrupt for a user-facing prompt. A more natural and user-friendly phrasing would improve the experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ウィンドウのサイズを変更するか、フルスクリーン表示にしてください

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the use of 'か' implies an either/or. It might be better to use a softer phrasing to guide the user towards a solution.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ウィンドウのサイズを変更するか、フルスクリーン表示を試してみてください

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເຕັມຈໍ' (tem chao) is technically correct (full screen), but 'ເຕັມໜ້າຈໍ' (tem na chao) might be more natural and clearer for Lao speakers, especially in a technical context. It emphasizes the whole screen.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກະລຸນາປັບຂະໜາດໜ້າຈໍ ຫຼືເປີດໃຊ້ໂໝດເຕັມໜ້າຈໍ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Vergroot het venster of schakel de volledig-scherm modus in." is not a direct or natural translation of 'Please resize the window or enable full-screen mode'. 'Vergroot' (enlarge) implies a specific action. A more accurate translation would use a word that suggests adjustment or change in size.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pas de venstergrootte aan of schakel de volledig-scherm modus in.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'comutare în mod ecran complet' is a literal translation of 'switch to full-screen mode' and isn't the most natural Romanian phrasing for 'enable full-screen mode'.

The translation 'කවුළුව යළි ප්‍රමාණනය කරන්න හෝ පූර්ණ තිර ප්‍රකාරය සබල කරන්න' doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of 'Please resize the window or enable full-screen mode'. 'කවුළුව' translates to 'window' but the instruction implies resizing the application window, not literally the physical window. 'පූර්ණ තිර ප්‍රකාරය' is a bit literal and formal for 'full-screen mode'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation that emphasizes resizing the application window, such as 'වියූදු පත්‍රය ප්‍රමාණාත්මක කරන්න හෝ පුරාවෘත්ත තිර සැට්ටිය සක්‍රීය කරන්න' or 'වියූදු පත්‍රය විශාල කරන්න හෝ පුරාවෘත්ත තිර ක්‍රියාත්මක කරන්න'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the translation lacks the 'Please' found in the original English content. Adding 'దయවන්න' (Dayawanna) to the beginning would be more polite and align better with typical phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: దయවන්න, වියූදු පත්‍රය ප්‍රමාණාත්මක කරන්න හෝ පුරාවෘත්ත තිර සැට්ටිය සක්‍රීය කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Промените величину прозора или омогуц́ите режим целог екрана' does not accurately convey the meaning of 'Please resize the window or enable full-screen mode'. 'Промените величину прозора' literally translates to 'Change the size of the window', which is more forceful than 'Please resize'.  'Омогуц́ите режим целог екрана' translates to 'Enable full screen mode,' but a more natural phrasing would be 'укључите режим целог екрана' or similar.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Молимо промените величину прозора или укључите режим целог екрана

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'omogućite' has an incorrect diacritic. It should be 'omogući'.
